reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and she explains complex concepts clearly. Her office hours are very helpful.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant professor! Prof. Chen's passion for coding is contagious. His projects are challenging but incredibly rewarding.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Williams knows her subject well, but her lectures can be a bit dry. More interactive sessions would be great.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez brings history to life with his storytelling. His exams are tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is an exceptional educator. Her lab sessions are well-organized and her enthusiasm is infectious.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson seems knowledgeable, but he often moves too fast and doesn't explain steps clearly enough.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's analysis of classic literature is insightful. Her feedback on essays is always constructive.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Brown's lectures can be hit or miss. Some topics are explained well, others leave you confused.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is amazing! She relates course material to current events and encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson has a great sense of humor that makes econ interesting. His real-world examples are very helpful.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez's passion for art is evident in every lecture. Her virtual museum tours are a highlight.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor knows his stuff, but sometimes gets sidetracked during lectures. More structure would be beneficial.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. White's field trips are fantastic. She really helps students understand the practical aspects of environmental issues.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Kim's discussions are thought-provoking and engaging. He encourages students to question everything.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Green brings a wealth of field experience to her classes. Her anecdotes make the subject come alive.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Lee's lectures feel outdated. More focus on current business trends would greatly improve the course.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is a linguistic genius! Her explanations of complex language structures are always clear and fascinating.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Johnson is knowledgeable but can be impatient with beginners. More practice exercises would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Patel's lectures are mind-blowing. She explains complex brain functions in a way that's easy to grasp.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Chen makes stats less intimidating. His step-by-step problem-solving approach is very effective.
